name: Nate Moore
about:
I am a developer and designer with a passion for DX and UI/UX work. I excel at leveraging my
technical, visual, and writing expertise to create approachable experiences.

companies.description:
Lead UI designer and contributing engineer on two hybrid, patient-facing healthcare applications;
oversaw adoption of Angular & Ionic.

Created brand and design system for client business; lead designer and engineer of company website
with Stencil-built web components on a Wordpress backend.

Worked with numerous small businesses; provided consultation and/or implementation of branding,
web development, illustration, and print design.

personal: Adept at improving user and developer experiences
Skilled user of design and language to distill complex concepts

Stencil Tools.text: Open-source editor extension that streamlines Developer Experience with Stencil.

tslint-stencil.text: Custom TSLint rules in Stencil projects.

typescript-plugin-stencil.text: Typescript Server plugin that improves Intellisense in Stencil projects.

konami-listener.text: Vanilla Web Component that adds a Konami Code easter egg to any web app.

ts-plugin.text: Command Line tool for managing Typescript Server plugins.
